caller_intent: Obtain renewal information for a homeowner's policy (policy number H011287399) and confirm payment details, including the correct mailing address for premium payments.
resolution_steps: Agent Jamie verified the policy details for Emily Gross/Stephen Hogan (policy H011287399) under Cincinnati Insurance.
Confirmed renewal dates (Jan 30, 2026–Jan 30, 2027) and annual premium of $2,445 (fully outstanding).
Reviewed mortgage clause details for CMG Mortgage Inc. (loan number 0198388670) and confirmed it is listed as the first lien holder.
Provided correct payment mailing address (PO Box 740099, Cincinnati, OH 45274) after initial discrepancy.
Agreed to upload the declaration page to CMG Mortgage's website (www.mycoverageinfo.com).
knowledge_required: Cincinnati Insurance policy details and payment protocols
summary: Heather Brownson from CMG Mortgage requested renewal details for a Cincinnati Insurance policy (H011287399) and confirmed payment information. Agent Jamie verified policy terms, resolved a mailing address discrepancy, and agreed to upload the declaration page to CMG's website. The call concluded with pending action to send documents.
